   313	        def convert_awq_tensor(tensor, tensor_type):
   314	            # convert awq qweight/qzeros to a standard format (assume int4)
   315	            # qweight: (k, n // pack_factor_bit32) -> (n, k // pack_factor_bit8)
   316	            # qzeros: (k // group_size, n // pack_factor_bit32) ->
   317	            #         (n // pack_factor_bit8, k // group_size)
   318	            # pack_factor_bit32 = 32 // weight_bits
   319	            # pack_factor_bit8 = 8 // weight_bits
   320	
   321	            # 0. suppose origin shape (a, b), dtype int32
   322	            # 1. convert to uint8, shape (a, b) -> (a, 4 * b)
   323	            size0 = tensor.size(0)
   324	            tensor = tensor.view(torch.uint8)
   325	
   326	            # 2. unpack to uint4 (only when weight_bits == 4)
   327	            #    shape (a, 4 * b) -> (a, 4 * b, 2)
   328	            shifter = torch.tensor([0, 4],
   329	                                   dtype=torch.uint8,
   330	                                   device=tensor.device)
   331	            tensor = (tensor[:, :, None] >> shifter) & 0xF
   332	
   333	            # 3. change order, see
   334	            # https://github.com/casper-hansen/AutoAWQ/blob/v0.2.8/awq/utils/quant_utils.py

   336	            reverse_awq_pack_order = [0, 4, 1, 5, 2, 6, 3, 7]
   337	            tensor = tensor.view(-1, 8)[:, reverse_awq_pack_order]
   338	            tensor = tensor.view(size0, -1)
   339	
   340	            # 4. transpose, shape -> (4 * b * pack_factor_bit8, a)
   341	            tensor = tensor.T.contiguous()

   343	            # 5. repack (only when weight_bits == 4)

   345	            # qzeros shape -> (4 * b, a)
   346

   348	                tensor = tensor[:, 1::2] * 16 + tensor[:, ::2]

   350	                tensor = tensor[1::2, :] * 16 + tensor[::2, :]
